verses.verse: And it came to pass in the eleventh <WH259> year <WH8141>, in the third <WH7992> month <WH259>, in the first day of the month <WH2320>, that the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, speak <WH559> unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and to his multitude <WH1995>; Whom are you like <WH1819> in your greatness <WH1433>?

Behold <WH804>, the Assyrian was a cedar <WH730> in Lebanon <WH3844> with fair <WH3303> branches <WH6057>, and with a shadowing <WH6751> shroud <WH2793>, and of a high <WH1362> stature <WH6967>; and his top <WH6788> was among the thick boughs <WH5688>.

The waters <WH4325> made him great <WH1431>, the deep <WH8415> set him up on high <WH7311> with her rivers <WH5104> running <WH1980> round about <WH5439> his plants <WH4302>, and sent out <WH7971> her little rivers <WH8585> unto all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>.

Therefore his height <WH6967> was exalted <WH1361> above all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>, and his boughs <WH5634> were multiplied <WH7235>, and his branches <WH6288> became long <WH748> because of the multitude <WH7227> of waters <WH4325>, when he shot forth <WH7971>.

All the birds <WH5775> of heaven <WH8064> made their nests <WH7077> in his boughs <WH5589>, and under his branches <WH6288> did all the animals <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> bring forth their young <WH3205>, and under his shadow <WH6738> lived <WH3427> all great <WH7227> nations <WH1471>.
Thus was he fair <WH3302> in his greatness <WH1433>, in the length <WH753> of his branches <WH1808>: for his root <WH8328> was by great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>.

The cedars <WH730> in the garden <WH1588> of God <WH430> could not hide <WH6004> him <WH1265>: the fir trees were not like <WH1819> his boughs <WH5589>, and the chesnut trees <WH6196> were not like his branches <WH6288>; nor any tree <WH6086> in the garden <WH1588> of God <WH430> was like <WH1819> unto him in his beauty <WH3308>.

I have made <WH6213> him fair <WH3303> by the multitude <WH7230> of his branches <WH1808>: so that all the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731>, that were in the garden <WH1588> of God <WH430>, envied him <WH7065>.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because you have lifted up <WH1361> yourself in height <WH6967>, and he has shot up <WH5414> his top <WH6788> among the thick boughs <WH5688>, and his heart <WH3824> is lifted up <WH7311> in his height <WH1363>;

I have therefore delivered <WH5414> him into the hand <WH3027> of the mighty one <WH410> of the heathen <WH1471>; he shall surely <WH6213> deal <WH6213> with him <WH1644>: I have driven him out for his wickedness <WH7562>.

And strangers <WH2114>, the terrible <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471>, have cut him off <WH3772>, and have left <WH5203> him <WH2022>: upon the mountains and in all the valleys <WH1516> his branches <WH1808> are fallen <WH5307>, and his boughs <WH6288> are broken <WH7665> by all the rivers <WH650> of the land <WH776>; and all the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> are gone down <WH3381> from his shadow <WH6738>, and have left him <WH5203>.
Upon his ruin <WH4658> shall all the birds <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> remain <WH7931>, and all the animals <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall be upon his branches <WH6288>:

To the end that none of all the trees <WH6086> by the waters <WH4325> exalt <WH1361> themselves for their height <WH6967>, neither shoot up <WH5414> their top <WH6788> among the thick boughs <WH5688>, neither their trees <WH352> stand up <WH5975> in their height <WH1363>, all that drink <WH8354> water <WH4325>: for they are all delivered <WH5414> unto death <WH4194>, to the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>, in the midst <WH8432> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>, with them that go down <WH3381> to the pit <WH953>.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; In the day <WH3117> when he went down <WH3381> to the grave <WH7585> I caused a mourning <WH56>: I covered <WH3680> the deep <WH8415> for him <WH4513>, and I restrained the floods <WH5104> there <WH7227>, and the great waters <WH4325> were stayed <WH3607>: and I caused Lebanon <WH3844> to mourn <WH6937> for him <WH6086>, and all the trees of the field <WH7704> fainted for him <WH5969>.

I made the nations <WH1471> to shake <WH7493> at the sound <WH6963> of his fall <WH4658>, when I cast him down <WH3381> to hell <WH7585> with them that descend <WH3381> into the pit <WH953>: and all the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731>, the choice <WH4005> and best <WH2896> of Lebanon <WH3844>, all that drink <WH8354> water <WH4325>, shall be comforted <WH5162> in the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>.

They also went down <WH3381> into hell <WH7585> with him unto them that be slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>; and they that were his arm <WH2220>, that lived <WH3427> under his shadow <WH6738> in the midst <WH8432> of the heathen <WH1471>.

To whom are you thus like <WH1819> in glory <WH3519> and in greatness <WH1433> among the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731>? yet shall you be brought down <WH3381> with the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731> unto the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>: you shall lie <WH7901> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> with them that be slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>. This is Pharaoh <WH6547> and all his multitude <WH1995>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.
